name: Curse of the Undercurrent
description:
When character(s) on this side of the playing field use Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts: They must spend 1 extra Elemental Die.
After character(s) on this side of the playing field have used 2 Skills: Remove this effect.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When character(s) on this side of the playing field use Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts:</color> They must spend 1 extra Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After character(s) on this side of the playing field have used 2 Skills:</color> Remove this effect.
